title: `npm run test-ci` fails with  lib/classes/PluginManager.test.js
body:
# Bug Report

## Description

When I run `npm run test-ci` with the latest commit aba4e09c7be7e1c89b14728428f0f1a3bf9ccbbb, it fails and shows following message:

```
  105 passing (8s)
  1 failing

  1) PluginManager
       #loadAllPlugins()
         should throw an error when trying to load unknown plugin:

      AssertionError: expected [Function] to throw 'ServerlessError' but 'TypeError: Cannot read property \'realPath\' of null' was thrown
      + expected - actual

      -TypeError: Cannot read property 'realPath' of null
      +ServerlessError
      
      at Context.it (lib/classes/PluginManager.test.js:710:74)
      at process._tickCallback (internal/process/next_tick.js:61:11)



lib/classes/PluginManager.test.js failed

npm ERR! code ELIFECYCLE
npm ERR! errno 1
npm ERR! serverless@1.54.0 test-isolated: `mocha-isolated`
npm ERR! Exit status 1
npm ERR! 
npm ERR! Failed at the serverless@1.54.0 test-isolated script.
npm ERR! This is probably not a problem with npm. There is likely additional logging output above.

npm ERR! A complete log of this run can be found in:
npm ERR!     /Users/akito/.npm/_logs/2019-10-12T07_00_32_589Z-debug.log
npm ERR! code ELIFECYCLE
npm ERR! errno 1
npm ERR! serverless@1.54.0 test-ci: `npm run prettier-check-updated && npm run lint-updated && npm run test-isolated`
npm ERR! Exit status 1
npm ERR! 
npm ERR! Failed at the serverless@1.54.0 test-ci script.
npm ERR! This is probably not a problem with npm. There is likely additional logging output above.
```

Commit 050cb90684c03559fd484c89fb13ab380b3c263a may be related to this issue.
When I run the same command with the previous commit, 4d9006bcdf783f96ca89c4901947c7159ea64121, it gets success.
author: kdnakt

comments.body: @kdnakt ensure to update dependencies with `npm install` (error is like you've pulled new changes but didn't update the dependencies)
@medikoo Thanks for your advise, I got success after running `npm install`!

satisfaction_conditions: Identifies the root cause of the test failure related to dependency management
Explains the relationship between code changes and dependency requirements
Provides a general troubleshooting approach for test failures after code updates

_classification.category: Can be dockerized without any issue

repository_info.dockerfile:
--- ./Dockerfile ---
FROM node:latest

# install yarn
RUN curl -o- -L https://yarnpkg.com/install.sh | bash

# install python tooling
RUN apt-get update -y && apt-get install -y python-dev python-pip && pip install --upgrade pip

# install other utils
RUN apt-get update -y && apt-get install -y screen

# install aws-cli
RUN pip install awscli

github_workflows..github/workflows/update-sfe-next.yml:
on:
  push:
    # Sequence of patterns matched against refs/heads
    branches:
      - master
name: Update the sfe-next branch on pushes to master
jobs:
  updateSfeNextBranch:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@master
      - name: Setup node
        uses: actions/setup-node@v1
      - name: update the dependency on @serverless/enterprise-plugin to the next tag
        run: node scripts/update-sfe-dep.js
      - name: git commit
        uses: srt32/git-actions@v0.0.3
        with:
          args: git config --global user.email "engineering@serverless.com" && git config --global user.name "Github Action" && git commit -am 'Update the dependency on @serverless/enterprise-plugin to the next tag'
      - name: git push
        uses: srt32/git-actions@v0.0.3
        with:
          args: git push https://${GITHUB_ACTOR}:${GITHUB_TOKEN}@github.com/${GITHUB_REPOSITORY} HEAD:sfe-next -f
        env:
          GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}

dockerfile:
FROM node:12-buster-slim

# Install system dependencies required for build and AWS CLI
RUN apt-get update -y && \
    apt-get install -y python3-dev python3-pip python3-distutils git && \
    pip3 install --upgrade pip && \
    pip3 install awscli && \
    apt-get clean && \
    rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

# Clone repository and checkout specific commit with the fix
RUN git clone https://github.com/serverless/serverless.git /app
WORKDIR /app
RUN git checkout 238068cfc5553cde319900f2fba62f6ade35a067

# Install project dependencies and link globally
RUN npm install
RUN npm link
